title: Fastly CDN Server Issue Brings Down Swathes of Websites
content:
Vast swathes of the web are currently offline, including Reddit, Spotify, Twitch, gov.uk, Hulu, HBO Max, Quora, PayPal, Vimeo, Shopify, CNN, The Guardian, The New York Times, BBC News, Bloomberg, and Financial Times sites.


The outage is down to a glitch in CDN provider Fastly's servers. Fastly has confirmed it's investigating an outage on its status website. Having nothing to do with Fastly, none of Apple's services are currently impacted. MacRumors.com and the MacRumors forums continue to operate as normal.
This article, "Fastly CDN Server Issue Brings Down Swathes of Websites" first appeared on MacRumors.com
